originalText.text: As a primary care doctor, I have sent dozens of patients to Dr. Silvers always confident that they will receive the best care.  As a patient I have personally had the pleasure to experience her kindness, clinical acumen,  well-run office and friendly, helpful staff.

originalText.text: I had a great experience with Dr Silvers, she made me feel super comfortable and was extremely knowledgeable. She set out a very clear treatment plan to follow and it was easy setting up follow up appointments.

text.text: I had a great experience with Dr Silvers, she made me feel super comfortable and was extremely knowledgeable. She set out a very clear treatment plan to follow and it was easy setting up follow up appointments.

originalText.text: Dr. Silvers is an amazing doctor.  I was referred to her after years of struggling with a medical concern that no one else seemed to know how to solve.  I know this can sound fake in reviews, but this was literally an instance where I walked into her office and started to describe my symptoms and she simply said: I know what this and I know how to treat this.  And she did!  It felt like a miracle (or a gift).  But, maybe even more relevant for other people, I have continued to see Dr. Silvers to manage this condition for a number of years.  She is caring on a personal level and a very thoughtful doctor, and has worked with me to manage medication and find the correct dosage and mix to treat me at the minimum effective dose (which I really appreciate).

originalText.text: Dr. Silvers has been my ENT for over 10 years now. She is knowledgeable, kind, patient, and understanding. I was having recurring sinus infections and she first tried treating it naturally. Didnâ€™t work. We moved to medication. Didnâ€™t work. After 4 months of trying, she did a CT scan and determined I needed surgery. I havenâ€™t had a sinus infection since. Best decision Iâ€™ve made. Surgery went beautifully and she called to check on me after surgery. Now, I only see her when I have a serious issue and she always solves the problem. Hands down my favorite doctor. She doesnâ€™t sugarcoat things; she tells you like it is. She has a wonderful bedside manner and treats you like a human. She doesnâ€™t talk above you but rather in your level. I highly recommend her!
